tool_description: Parses and normalizes price information from text, handling various currency formats, symbols, and discount representations.
error_messages: No price found: No valid price information detected in the provided text
Invalid currency format: Price format doesn't match expected currency symbol and separators
Multiple conflicting prices: Found multiple different prices without clear context
Invalid separator configuration: Decimal and thousands separators cannot be the same character
usage: Provide text containing price information and configure currency format settings. The tool extracts and normalizes price values with discount information if present.

original_price.description: Original price value before any discounts

raw_price_text.description: Original price text as found in content
